feed.subtitle: Russian lies , war crimes , Russia , invasion of ukraine, kremlin, fake news, the true, no censure.

entry.title: French channel TF1 reports on Mariupol and Mykolaiv

link.title: French channel TF1 reports on Mariupol and Mykolaiv

entry.content:
TF1 report on the siege of Mariupol and the distress of the people. Russian soldiers are blocking the evacuation of the civilian population. Many deaths, no water, no food, no heating. People are dying of cold, hunger and under the Russian bombs. In Mykolaiv, the Russians bomb the town.

source : TF1
entry.summary: TF1 report on the siege of Mariupol and the distress of the people. Russian soldiers are blocking the evacuation of the civilian population. Many deaths, no water, no food, no heating. People are dying of cold, hunger and under the Russian bombs. In Mykolaiv, the Russians bomb the town. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : TF1

entry.title: Many children have died under the Russian army’s bombardment

link.title: Many children have died under the Russian army’s bombardment

entry.content:
79 children were killed and over 100 injured during the war in Ukraine.

warcrimes.gov.ua
entry.summary: 79 children were killed and over 100 injured during the war in Ukraine. warcrimes.gov.ua

entry.title: Melitopol residents protest against the capture of the mayor

link.title: Melitopol residents protest against the capture of the mayor

entry.content: Several thousand Melitopol residents turned out for a rally in front of the administrative building to demand the release of Mayor Ivan Fedorov, who was kidnapped by Russian occupiers. Ukrainians do not want the Russians.
entry.summary: Several thousand Melitopol residents turned out for a rally in front of the administrative building to demand the release of Mayor Ivan Fedorov, who was kidnapped by Russian occupiers. Ukrainians do not want the Russians. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.

entry.title: Destruction by the Russian army in Makariv

link.title: Destruction by the Russian army in Makariv

entry.content: Russian attack on civilian buildings in Makariv. They are destroying Ukraine.
entry.summary: Russian attack on civilian buildings in Makariv. They are destroying Ukraine.

entry.title: 2 Russian helicopters shot down
entry.content:
2 Russian helicopters shot down by the Ukrainian army over the Skadovsk district in the Kherson region. One of the pilots survived and was taken to hospital.

source : twitter
entry.summary: 2 Russian helicopters shot down by the Ukrainian army over the Skadovsk district in the Kherson region. One of the pilots survived and was taken to hospital. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : twitter

entry.title: Russian soldiers confront Ukrainian civilians
entry.content:
Russian soldiers challenged by Ukrainian civilians. Here is the translation

Russian soldiers confronted by Ukrainian civilians.

Soldiers: “Do you understand that if we leave, we will be deserters?

Woman: “If you don’t leave you will be murderers”.

Civilians: “Leave your weapons” “We will not touch you” “Choose life (x2)”

source : twitter
entry.summary: Russian soldiers challenged by Ukrainian civilians. Here is the translation Russian soldiers confronted by Ukrainian civilians. Soldiers: “Do you understand that if we leave, we will be deserters? Woman: “If you don’t leave you will be murderers”. Civilians: “Leave your weapons” “We will not touch you” “Choose life (x2)” Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : twitter

entry.title: Mariupol : bombing of residential area by the Russian army

link.title: Mariupol : bombing of residential area by the Russian army

entry.content: In Mariupol the Russian army continues to bomb residential areas. The inhabitants are dying under the Russian bombs. There is no water, no food, no heating.
entry.summary: In Mariupol the Russian army continues to bomb residential areas. The inhabitants are dying under the Russian bombs. There is no water, no food, no heating.

entry.title: Damage in Mariupol after the Russian bombing

link.title: Damage in Mariupol after the Russian bombing

entry.content:
In a residential area of Mariupol. Bombing of the Russian army. At least 1 civilian was killed.

source : twitter
entry.summary: In a residential area of Mariupol. Bombing of the Russian army. At least 1 civilian was killed. Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. source : twitter

entry.title: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Mariupol

link.title: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Mariupol

entry.content: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Marioupol which caused at least 3 deaths.
entry.summary: Bombing by Russia of a maternity hospital in Marioupol which caused at least 3 deaths.

entry.title: The russian army shoot the journalist guillaume briquet

link.title: The russian army shoot the journalist guillaume briquet

entry.content:
Russian troops fire on Swiss journalist Guillaume Briquet. He worked in the Mykolaiv region, his car marked PRESS was hit. They also stole his passport, money and equipment.

Sources : blick.ch
entry.summary: Russian troops fire on Swiss journalist Guillaume Briquet. He worked in the Mykolaiv region, his car marked PRESS was hit. They also stole his passport, money and equipment. Sources : blick.ch
